page.title: 12A boy's typical schoolday
page.content: My name is David Ponsonby. I am 11 years old.I get up at quarter to 8 and dress. Then I go downstairs and have some breakfast.At 1/4 to 9 I set off for school. School starts at 9 o'clock and we have an assembly.At about 9.30am I go to the classroom and read for twenty minutes, then I do maths.At 10.30a.m. the school has a break.It lasts 20 minutes,and then we go in and do English Language.At 12 noon I go for dinner; I take my own sandwiches.We then have playtime until 1.20pm. In first part of the afternoon we do art and things like that,and after a short break we do project work.At 3.50pm we say a prayer and then I go home.When I get home I watch television and have my tea.After tea I go out and play cricket and football.I come in at 8.o'clock and go to bed at 10.00pm.
